meanings.definition: Lysolecithins: a class of phospholipids that are important components of cell membranes.
meanings.sent1: The lysolecithins play a crucial role in maintaining the structure of cell membranes.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the function of lysolecithins in cell membranes.
meanings.sent3: The lysolecithins in the cell membrane decided to have a party to celebrate their importance.
meanings.sent4: Like the bricks in a wall, lysolecithins provide strength and support to cell membranes.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the intricate network of lysolecithins in the cell membrane was revealed.
